trans-unit.source: Represents a data view on an XML node or collection of XML nodes for an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma vista de dados num nó XML ou coleção de nós XML para uma <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control can present its underlying data in both tabular and hierarchical format to Web server controls that bind to it.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>controlo pode apresentar os respetivos dados subjacentes no formato de tabela e hierárquico para controlos de servidor Web que vincular ao mesmo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> to bind to XML data and present it in list or tabular form, while controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>, bind to XML data and present it in hierarchical form.
trans-unit.target: Controla como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>utilizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>vincular-se aos dados XML e apresente-a na lista ou formato tabular, enquanto os controlos de derivam a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>classe, tal como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>, vincular-se aos dados XML e apresentá-lo na forma hierárquica.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> creates each view type internally through different code paths.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>cria cada tipo de vista internamente através de caminhos de código diferentes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView%2A> method is called on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control, an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> object is created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView%2A>método é chamado o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>controlo, um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView>objeto é criado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A> method is called, an XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView object is created.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A>método é denominado, é criado um objecto XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> class is provided for Web server controls that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> and bind to lists and tabular data, while the XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView is provided for Web server controls that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> and bind to hierarchical data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView>classe é fornecida para controlos de servidor Web que derivem de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>e vincular a listas e dados de tabela, enquanto o XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView é fornecida para a Web server controla que derivam de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>e vincular a dados hierárquicos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Internally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeDataBoundControl> classes call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView.Select%2A> method of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> object view to retrieve data from a data source, while a class derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Internamente, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeDataBoundControl>classes de chamada de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView.Select%2A>método de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView>objeto vista para obter dados de uma origem de dados, enquanto uma classe derivada de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>chamadas a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: Like all <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView> helper objects, the XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView defines the operations that the data source can perform with the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: Como todos os <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>objetos de programa auxiliar, o XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView define as operações que pode efetuar a origem de dados com os dados subjacentes.</xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Because the XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView class only overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> method, the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control does not support sort expressions or execute, delete, or update operations.
trans-unit.target: Porque o XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView classe substituições apenas o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>método, associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>controlo não suporta expressões de ordenação ou executar, eliminar ou atualizar operações.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of the data items from the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma lista dos itens de dados da origem de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable> that is returned by <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> is an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> and can be used like any <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable>que é devolvido pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>é um <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>e pode ser utilizado como qualquer <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>coleção.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> </xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A> method to get an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> and iterate through the collection of <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> nodes, or use `foreach` (in C#) or `For Each` (Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>método para obter um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>e itere através da coleção de <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>nós, ou utilize `foreach` (em c#) ou `For Each` (Visual Basic).</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"></xref> collection of data items based on the hierarchical level of the current view.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"> </xref> colecção de itens de dados com base no nível hierárquico da vista atual.
